item.title: Inside the Stunning Mansion in Ex Machina
item.description:
Inside the Stunning Mansion in Ex Machina

There are many stunning, otherworldly sights in Ex Machina, the science-fiction film directed by Alex Garland that features a robot so lifelike she's played by actress Alicia Vikander. But the most breathtaking sight of all may be the 100 percent real, available-for-a-night's-stay location where the film is set: the Juvet Landscape Hotel in Norway.

item.title: Pendleton + Airstream's 2016 National Park Foundation Travel Trailer
item.description:
Pendleton + Airstream's 2016 National Park Foundation Travel Trailer

There is, perhaps, no more appropriate setting for an Airstream than one of America's National Parks. Airstream campers, in production since 1929, are designed for adventure and, with their 2016 Pendleton National Park Travel Trailer, Airstream is honoring the 100th anniversary of America's National Parks-iconic camping destinations-with style.

item.title: Airbnb's Coolest Tiny Houses in America
item.description:
Airbnb's Coolest Tiny Houses in America

Tiny homes are all the rage, so it makes perfect sense that tiny homes people list on Airbnb are also quite popular. And that's…
